FuncDef:
The display ospfv3 abr-summary-list command displays information about OSPFv3 summary routes on an area border router (ABR).
The display ospfv3 asbr-summary command displays information about OSPFv3 summary routes on an AS boundary router (ASBR). The display ospfv3 abr-summary-list command displays information about OSPFv3 summary routes on an area border router (ABR). The display ospfv3 asbr-summary command displays information about OSPFv3 summary routes on an AS boundary router (ASBR). This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays information about summary routes in the specified OSPFv3 process.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.

Specifies the IPv6 address.
The value is a 32-digit hexadecimal number, in the format X:X::X:X.

Specifies the prefix length of an IPv6 address.
It is an integer ranging from 0 to 128.

Displays detailed information about OSPFv3 summary routes.
-
